item.description:
You're invited to join us at Lucy Ann's house for a Day of Scrapping & Stamping fun.

Bring along your latest paper crafting project and join the fun.

Are you new to scrapping or stamping and want to learn something new? I teach scrapbooking and stamping-card making classes and can bring things that I need for specific techniques. Drop me a note at marilyn.sanclemente@comcast.net with any questions. You can also check out card kits and lots of ideas on my website at www.stampwithmarilyn.com.

You are welcome to bring a lunch or we can order food from a local pizza place.
item.name: Daytime Scrap & Stamp
